name: BuggyOS
short_description:
Buggy OS is something amazing! It offers you something that not many operating systems offer (including yours!!). Listen to music, enjoy the Internet, watch movies, write texts, play games, install new applications without worring about viruses!

Because life is too short. You dont have to spend it waiting your computer to load your favorite music! Experience the ultimate level of speed!

You may be bored with all these applications full of flashing adverts. Buggy OS offers you a software manager. No more unveriefied source of applications!
summary: It may not be suitable for everyone, but it's the best for YOU!
